.content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 100%);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#bdcadb,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.square{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.square              <article class="article-list__article">
              <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context="[]">
               <h4 class="article-list__article-title">
                <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/san-juan-unified-school-district-to-resume-in-person-learning-monday/">

                </a>

             </article>
             <article class="article-list__article">

      <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--hero-full" data-module-type="standard layout" id="standard-layout">

        Headlines
       </h2>
       <div class="article-list__content">
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type main-story-link" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="807365" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="0">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="Sheriff’s office investigating deadly shooting in North Highlands" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/sheriffs-office-large-police-presence-at-north-highlands-shooting/">

           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-0" data-link-label="Local News" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/">
            Local News
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T18:04:17-07:00">
            6 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/12/blue20police20lights_1520980399280-3.jpg_37025927_ver1.0-3.jpg?w=650&amp;h=488&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/sheriffs-office-large-police-presence-at-north-highlands-shooting/">

        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="807411" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="1">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="Sacramento students eager to head back into classrooms to learn in person" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/sacramento-students-eager-to-head-back-into-classrooms-to-learn-in-person/">
            Sacramento students eager to head back into classrooms to learn in person
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-1" data-link-label="Local News" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/">
            Local News
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T22:09:39-07:00">
            2 hours ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link" data-link-label="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="1" data-link-type="standard-content-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/sacramento-students-eager-to-head-back-into-classrooms-to-learn-in-person/">

            <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6458566">
             <img alt="" loading="eager" sizes="(max-width: 899px) 0vw, 80px" src="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=876&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 876w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/snapshot-75-1.jpg?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>
            </div>
            <span aria-hidden="true" class="article-list__article-mediaicon article-list__article-mediaicon--video" tabindex="-1">
             <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-svg">
              <svg height="13" viewbox="0 0 11 13" width="11" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
               <defs>
                <style>
                 .cls-1{fill:#fff;fill-rule:evenodd}
                </style>
               </defs>
               <path class="cls-1" d="M842 1167.5l-11 6.5v-13z" data-name="video small carousel button default" id="video_small_carousel_button_default" transform="translate(-831 -1161)">
               </path>
              </svg>
             </span>
             <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">
              Video
             </span>
            </span>
           </div>
          </a>
         </figure>
        </article>

             <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">

        <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-7">
         <section class="article-list article-list-carousel article-list-carousel--dropin" data-carousel-duration="0" data-component="articleListCarousel" data-context="carousel_dropin">
          <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
           Coronavirus Latest
          </h2>
          <div class="article-list__content">
           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="807318" data-collection="article-list3" data-index="0">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list3" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/california-connection/california-adopts-3-foot-distancing-rule-for-classrooms/">
               California adopts 3-foot distancing rule for classrooms
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/california-connection/">
               California Connection
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-21T12:46:36-07:00">
               11 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/california-connection/california-adopts-3-foot-distancing-rule-for-classrooms/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape">

            </figure>
           </article>
           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="807276" data-collection="article-list3" data-index="1">

             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

              </a>

               14 hours ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>

             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/local-assemblymen-discuss-californias-covid-19-lockdown-one-year-after-it-began/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6453932">

              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/morning/">
               Morning
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2021-03-19T10:14:32-07:00">
               3 days ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>

             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/morning/aptera-motors-introduces-new-solar-car/">

               <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6453832">

           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            California Connection
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="807334" data-collection="article-list6" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list6" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
               <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/california-connection/three-killed-in-fiery-east-central-fresno-crash-during-high-speed-chase/">
                Three killed in fiery east-central Fresno crash during high-speed chase
               </a>
              </h3>
              <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
               <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/california-connection/">
                California Connection
               </a>
               /
               <time datetime="2021-03-21T14:34:05-07:00">
                9 hours ago
               </time>
              </footer>
             </div>
             <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/california-connection/three-killed-in-fiery-east-central-fresno-crash-during-high-speed-chase/">
               <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
                <div class="image-wrapper landscape">
                 <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px" src="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=854&amp;h=480&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=854&amp;h=480&amp;crop=1 876w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=854&amp;h=480&amp;crop=1 960w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=854&amp;h=480&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=854&amp;h=480&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=854&amp;h=480&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2021/03/26079081_1458803715203_7724066_ver1.0.jpg?w=854&amp;h=480&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>
                </div>
               </div>
              </a>
             </figure>
            </article>
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="807318" data-collection="article-list6" data-index="1">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list6" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>

             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list8" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>

                A rapid COVID-19 vaccine rollout backfired in some US states
               </a>
              </h3>

            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-slat article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="807056" data-collection="article-list8" data-index="3">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list8" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>
              <h3 class="article-list__article-title">

        <section class="widget widget--has-z-index-stacking-reset widget_ns-article-bin" data-component="dropzoneWidget" id="ns-article-bin-8">
         <section class="article-list article-list-carousel article-list-carousel--dropin" data-carousel-duration="0" data-component="articleListCarousel" data-context="carousel_dropin">
          <h2 class="article-list__heading article-list__heading--notched">
           Podcasts
          </h2>
          <div class="article-list__content">

              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/news/local-news/fox40-podcast-exposed-explores-east-area-rapist-case/">
               FOX40 podcast ‘Exposed’ explores East Area Rapist case
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

               Local News
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2020-08-18T09:11:57-07:00">
               7 months ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list11" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/podcasts/pandemic-behind-the-headlines/restaurants-for-the-love-of-food/">
               Restaurants: For the love of food
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/podcasts/pandemic-behind-the-headlines/">
               Pandemic: Behind the Headlines
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2020-04-22T14:24:32-07:00">
               11 months ago
              </time>
             </footer>
            </div>
            <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/podcasts/pandemic-behind-the-headlines/restaurants-for-the-love-of-food/">
              <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
               <div class="image-wrapper landscape">
                <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="256px" src="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=160&amp;h=90&amp;crop=1 160w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=256&amp;h=144&amp;crop=1 256w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=320&amp;h=180&amp;crop=1 320w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=512&amp;h=288&amp;crop=1 512w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=640&amp;h=360&amp;crop=1 640w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=876&amp;h=493&amp;crop=1 876w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=960&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 960w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=1280&amp;h=720&amp;crop=1 1280w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=1752&amp;h=986&amp;crop=1 1752w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 1920w, https://fox40.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/13/2020/04/Coronavirus_Podcast_Web_v4.png?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1 2560w"/>
               </div>
              </div>
             </a>
            </figure>
           </article>
           <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="510416" data-collection="article-list11" data-index="7">
            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list11" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list11" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/weather/new-podcast-paradise-lost-californias-deadliest-wildfire/">

              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">

               Weather
              </a>
              /

               2 years ago
              </time>

            <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list11" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","256px"]'>
             <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
              <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/podcasts/fire-ice-exploring-extreme-weather-in-the-western-u-s-including-californias-deadliest-wildfire/">
               ‘Fire &amp; Ice’: Exploring Extreme Weather in the Western U.S. — Including California’s Deadliest Wildfire
              </a>
             </h3>
             <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
              <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/podcasts/">
               Podcasts
              </a>
              /
              <time datetime="2019-03-01T16:41:30-08:00">
               2 years ago
              </time>
             </footer>

        <h2 class="weather-widget__heading">

        <a class="weather-widget__content" href="https://fox40.com/weather/">
         <div class="weather-widget__item">
          <h4 class="weather-widget__item-day">
           Current
          </h4>
          <h5 class="weather-widget__item-temperature">
           48°
          </h5>
          <figure class="weather-widget__item-icon">
           <span class="weather-icon weather-icon-sm weather-icon-dark-31">
           </span>
          </figure>
          <span class="weather-widget__item-conditions">
           Clear
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="weather-widget__item">
          <h4 class="weather-widget__item-day">
           Tonight
          </h4>
          <h5 class="weather-widget__item-temperature">
           42°
          </h5>
          <figure class="weather-widget__item-icon">
           <span class="weather-icon weather-icon-sm weather-icon-dark-29">
           </span>
          </figure>
          <span class="weather-widget__item-conditions">
           Partly Cloudy
          </span>
          <span class="weather-widget__item-precipitation">
           Precip: 7&amp;percnt;
          </span>
         </div>
         <div class="weather-widget__item">
          <h4 class="weather-widget__item-day">
           Tomorrow
          </h4>
          <h5 class="weather-widget__item-temperature">
           68°
          </h5>
          <figure class="weather-widget__item-icon">
           <span class="weather-icon weather-icon-sm weather-icon-dark-30">
           </span>
          </figure>
          <span class="weather-widget__item-conditions">
           Partly Cloudy
          </span>
          <span class="weather-widget__item-precipitation">
           Precip: 7&amp;percnt;
          </span>
         </div>
        </a>
       </aside>

          <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="792876" data-collection="article-list13" data-index="3">
           <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list13" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 899px) 50vw, 256px"]'>
            <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
             <a class="article-list__article-link" href="https://fox40.com/black-history-month/a-virtual-discussion-with-3-broadcast-legends-on-newsroom-diversity/">
              A virtual discussion with 3 broadcast legends on newsroom diversity
             </a>
            </h3>
            <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
             <a class="article-list__article-category-link" href="https://fox40.com/black-history-month/">
              Black History Month
             </a>
             /
             <time datetime="2021-02-25T14:37:38-08:00">
              3 weeks ago
             </time>
            </footer>
           </div>
           <figure class="article-list__article-thumb">

			e.type = 'text/javascript';
			e.async = true;

	}
	loadChartbeat();
})();

   var atsScript = document.createElement('script');
